job.title: .NET development for desktop applications
job.description:
Prerequisites:

1 - Possess a minimum of 10 years of pertinent professional experience.
2 - Proficient in .NET development for desktop applications, demonstrating expertise in diagnosing intricate and uncharted errors.
3 - Possess comprehensive knowledge of desktop applications, with a holistic understanding of the entire development lifecycle—from front-end to back-end.

questions.question: Do you have 8+ years of demonstrable.net experience?
Have you worked on complex and undocumented errors in .net?
Have you developed a desktop app from scratch?

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled .NET developer to join our team for a 1 to 3-month project involving desktop application development. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in the .NET Framework and a proven track record of successfully delivering similar projects.

Your main responsibility will be to develop and maintain desktop applications using .NET technologies. This will include designing, coding, testing, debugging, and documenting software solutions. You will also collaborate closely with our team to gather requirements and ensure the applications meet our clients' needs.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to this project. Additionally, we kindly request that you include links to any relevant past projects you have completed. We look forward to reviewing your proposal and finding the right candidate to join our team.
customFields.finalDescriptionAI:
Prerequisites:

1 - Possess a minimum of 10 years of pertinent professional experience.
2 - Proficient in .NET development for desktop applications, demonstrating expertise in diagnosing intricate and uncharted errors.
3 - Possess comprehensive knowledge of desktop applications, with a holistic understanding of the entire development lifecycle—from front-end to back-end.
